text: We chose Jordan and his team at Deck Masters to replace the existing decks on our log home and we couldn’t be happier with our decision. From professional, stress-free brainstorming meetings to the finished product, every experience with this company has exceeded our expectations. Our decks are beautiful; the skill and craftsmanship is evident in all aspects of their work. Throughout the entire process, it was quite evident that our satisfaction was the highest priority to Jordan and his crew. We highly recommend Jordan, Matt, Frank and the entire team at Deck Masters to help make your deck dreams a stunning reality!
author: Nancy Konop
